document.full_text: u.s. health officials thursday announced a new effort to curb america's obesity epidemic by moving science from the lab into clinical trials to find practical ways for prevention and treatment.
document.title: us nih obesity plan focuses on real-world research
lines_and_colors: u.s. health officials thursday announced a new effort to curb america's obesity epidemic by moving science from the lab into clinical trials to find practical ways for prevention and treatment.
